attributes.action: Make income support available to parents who choose to stay together, not just single parents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is it that only single parents get to go on income support and go to college, whereas if the child's parents choose to stay together and one wants to go to college the other can't stay at home and look after their child because there are no benefits available to us? Do we not have a right to study to full time to try and get a better job and have our child looked after by his/her parent instead of going into a creche to be looked after by strangers?
